name: Divi Collage
author: munirkamal

sections.description:
Divi Collage – The Easiest Collage Maker For Divi.

Divi Collage is a Divi module which lets you create beautiful collages easily. The module comes with a bunch of ready-made layouts. Just pick a layout and fill your images.

Visit Divi Collage for more info.

Important Note: Divi is built on-top of Divi Theme’s API. This plugin requires Divi Theme or Divi Builder plugin to function. It is a Divi module.
sections.faq:
Who should use the Divi Collage?

Divi Collage is a divi module. It lets you are beautiful collages via divi builder easily. It is 100% divi visual builder compatible plugin. If you use divi, this plugin is for you.

What are the requirements to use Divi Collage?

You need to have the latest version of WordPress on your website. Additionally you should also have Divi Theme or Divi Builder plugin, as this is a Divi module it only works with Divi.

Can I use Divi Collage on client websites?

Absolutely! You can definitely use Divi Collage on yours as well as your clientâ€™s websites. It’s FREE!
